To obtain the Heart of Stone, you need to defeat Shigandang in Fright Cliff in Rockrest Flat in Yellow Wind Ridge. You need all six Buddhas Eyeball items to be able to trigger this fight.
img_below_text: For even more guides and tips on finding all the items in the game, be sure to check out our guide on all the Black Myth: Wukong Weapons locations and Armor and Gear locations, as well as the Gourds, Curios, Vessels, and Transformation Spells locations. You can also find a library of all the Medicine Ingredients and Consumable Items in the game.
